tool_description: Start creating horoscopes and reports on your websites and mobile applications within minutes using Vedic Rishi Astro APIs. These APIs provide detailed vedic or Indian astrology calculations along with various prediction reports.
name: Advanced Astrology and Horoscope
title: Advanced Astrology and Horoscope

api_list.name: Get Planetary Positions
api_list.description: Full planetary positions including ascendant along with retrograde status and nakshatra, house, sign and their specific lordships.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com/planets/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Horoscope Charts
api_list.description: chart_id is based on chart type(all D-charts) - The data points include various planetary positions along with ascendant and their respective house positions to draw horoscope charts.

required_parameters.name: chart_id
required_parameters.description: D1 as chart_id provides birth chart or ascendant chart or lagna chart .Same way SUN : For Sun Chart, MOON : For Moon Chart, D2 : For Hora Chart, D3 : For Dreshkan Chart, D4 : For Chathurthamasha Chart, D5 : For Panchmansha Chart, D7 : For Saptamansha Chart, D8 : For Ashtamansha Chart, D9 : For Navamansha Chart, D10 : For Dashamansha Chart, D12 : For Dwadashamsha chart, D16 : For Shodashamsha Chart, D20 : For Vishamansha Chart, D24 : For Chaturvimshamsha Chart, D27 : For Bhamsha Chart, D30 : For Trishamansha Chart, D40 : For Khavedamsha Chart, D45 : For Akshvedansha Chart, D60 : For Shashtymsha Chart

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com/horo_chart/D1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com/horo_chart/{chart_id}"

headers = {

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com/numero_table/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vedicrishi-horoscope-and-astrology-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
